name: Offroad Hill Racing
description:
THIS IS IT! This is off-road done right! Drive the most fire-breathing offroad vehicles in this adrenaline-filled hill climb madness now!

Crash the barriers and fly above bottomless chasms with off-roaders, monster trucks, garbage behemoths and F1 racing cars! More than 60 levels with different driving situations are waiting for you. Start the engine, feel the power of huge MMX trucks and get your driving license now!

Game Features:
- Smooth and realistic vehicle handling
- More than 60 challenging levels
- Great 3D visuals and turbo sound
- Own, customize and upgrade vehicles including American and European classics
